statements.select: SELECT * FROM AcOtherShouldPayment WHERE AcOtherShouldPaymentDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate#

SELECT * FROM AcOtherShouldPayment WHERE AcOtherShouldPaymentDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND (#supplier# IS NULL OR SupplierId = #supplier#) AND (#company# IS NULL OR CompanyId = #company#)
